channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BEAM-1981] Serialization error with TimerInternals in ApexGroupByKeyOperator
item.description:
Logs below. We tried switching to Java serialization, but that didn't work. We made the field transient (which is broken but let us make progress) and that did.

Stack trace

com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoException: Class cannot be created (missing no-arg constructor): org.apache.beam.runners.core.AutoValue_TimerInternals_TimerData

item.summary: Serialization error with TimerInternals in ApexGroupByKeyOperator

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: thw do you think you'll be able to take a look at this? I'd really like to have this fixed for First Stable Release – a blocker for using Apex Runner.
Definitely. I also want to move the Apex dependency to 3.6.0 if that release is out in time.
